scripts.prep:kovan: npm run prep:kovan:l1 && npm run prep:kovan:l2
scripts.prep:mainnet: npm run prep:mainnet:l1 && npm run prep:mainnet:l2
scripts.codegen: npm run codegen:l1 && npm run codegen:l2
scripts.build: npm run build:l1 && npm run build:l2
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:l1 && npm run deploy:l2
scripts.deploy:l1: cd optimism-l1-subgraph && graph deploy --access-token 58bbc53b59b44369912d6fed2d6a672f --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ ethereum-optimism/optimism-l1-subgraph subgraph.yaml && cd ..
scripts.deploy:l2: cd optimism-l2-subgraph && graph deploy --access-token 58bbc53b59b44369912d6fed2d6a672f --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ ethereum-optimism/optimism-l2-subgraph subgraph.yaml && cd ..
